word_mean: 方程式，等式，反应式：以等号连接的两部分

sentence.Network_en: The party fears the equation between higher spending and higher taxes.
sentence.Network_cn: 该党担心难以平衡更多支出和更高税率之间的综合关系。

sentence.Network_en: This figure is reached by a fiendishly clever equation.
sentence.Network_cn: 这个数字是通过一个精妙的方程式计算出来的。

sentence.Network_en: We can express that equation like that.
sentence.Network_cn: 我们可以这样表示那个等式。

phrase.cizu_name: equation of the first (或 second 等) order

jx.jx_en_mean: (Mathematics)an equation involving only the first derivative, second derivative, etc.

derivation.yuyuan_name: late Middle English: from Latin aequatio(n-), from aequare 'make equal' (see equate)

entry.def: An equation is a mathematical statement saying that two amounts or values are the same, for example 6x4=12x2.

entry.tran: （多种因素需加以综合考虑的）平衡，综合体
entry.def: An equation is a situation in which two or more parts have to be considered together so that the whole situation can be understood or explained.

example.ex: The equation is simple: research breeds new products...
example.tran: 情况很简单：研究产生新产品。

example.ex: The party fears the equation between higher spending and higher taxes...
example.tran: 该党担心难以平衡更多支出和更高税率之间的综合关系。

means.word_mean: 1. a mathematical statement that two expressions are equal
2. a state of being essentially equal or equivalent; equally balanced;
3. the act of regarding as equal

auth_sentence.content: But, he absolutely knew what that equation meant.
auth_sentence.res_content: But, he absolutely knew what that equation meant.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: But, he absolutely knew what that equation meant.

auth_sentence.content: This is also the equation for the Pythagorean theorem.
auth_sentence.res_content: This is also the equation for the Pythagorean theorem.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: This is also the equation for the Pythagorean theorem.

auth_sentence.content: We cannot control that part of the equation.
auth_sentence.res_content: We cannot control that part of the equation.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: We cannot control that part of the equation.

stems_affixes.word_buile: ad加强+equ相等,平均+ate……的→和所需的趋向相等

stems_affixes.value_cn: 稳定的,不变的,[脾气]温和的
stems_affixes.word_buile: equ相等,平均+able……的→[心情]能稳定的
equ相等,平均+al……的→adj.相等的;胜任的n.相等的事务;对手v.等于
ad加强+equ相等,平均+acy状态→[数量]已经加到相等了→够了
equ相等,平均+al……的→adj.相等的;胜任的n.相等的事务;对手v.等于

stems_affixes.value_cn: 同等;平等;相等;等式;等同性
stems_affixes.word_buile: equal[adj.相等的;胜任的n.相等的事务;对手v.等于]+ity表名词→n.同等;平等;相等;等式;等同性
equate[v.同等看待,使相等]+ion表名词→n.[数学]等式,方程式;[with]相等;均衡
equ相等,平均+ity表名词→n.公平,公正
equ平等+anim生命+ity表名词→生命平等→平静
equ相等,平均+al……的→adj.相等的;胜任的n.相等的事务;对手v.等于
equ相等,平均+ate表动词→v.同等看待,使相等

Sentence.sentence: But the other side of that equation is that the US needs to save more.

sentences.en: The solution can be expressed by a mathematical equation.
sentences.cn: 答案可用一个数学方程式来表示。

jushi.english: In the equation 3 x +1=19, x is 6.
jushi.chinese: 在方程式3 x +1=19中, x 等于6。

jushi.english: There is an equation between unemployment and rising crime levels.
jushi.chinese: 失业人数和上升的犯罪数字趋于平衡。

jushi.english: The solution can be expressed by a mathematical equation.
jushi.chinese: 答案可用一个数学方程式来表示。
